member.name: M:ProductApi.Controllers.ProductController.GetProduct(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves details of a specific product by its ID.
member.param: The ID of the product to retrieve.

member.name: M:ProductApi.Controllers.ProductController.UpdateProduct(System.Int32,ProductApi.Models.Product)
member.summary: Updates details of a specific product.
member.param: The ID of the product to update.
The updated details of the product.

member.name: M:ProductApi.Controllers.ProductController.DeleteProduct(System.Int32)
